input.sentences: the musicians were versatile and dynamic .
they hopped from one instrument to another | demonstrating their skill .
as he took to the keyboard | he became invigorated .
at times | the music took over and the musicians became calm .
they worked well together as a two-man band .
output.sentences: We were watching a great band.
They were very skilled at all the instruments they played.
The main singer played guitar and played keyboard as well.
The drummer was also a keyboard player.
At the end they did this amazing duet.
